mentions.context: For our experiments, we relied on the POT package [Flamary and Courty, 2017] to compute the exact OT solver or the entropic OT loss and the Geomloss package [Feydy et al., 2019] for the Sinkhorn divergence.
The generative model and gradient flow experiments were designed in PyTorch [Paszke et al., 2017] and all the code is released here * .
The generative model and gradient flow experiments were designed in PyTorch [Paszke et al., 2017] and all the code is released here * .

For our experiments, we relied on the POT package [Flamary and Courty, 2017] to compute the exact OT solver or the entropic OT loss and the Geomloss package [Feydy et al., 2019] for the Sinkhorn divergence.
